name: Renzo Restaked WBTC
description: Renzo is a restaking protocol that abstracts and manages AVS strategies for Liquid Restaking Tokens (LRTs), making Ethereum and Solana restaking ezpz and accessible to everyone. ezBTC is the liquid restaking token representing a userâ€™s EigenLayer restaked position backed by wBTC. Users can deposit wBTC into the vault and receive ezBTC. Serving as the interface to the EigenLayer ecosystem, ezBTC secures Autonomous Verifiable Services (AVSs) to generate restaking rewards on top of BTC exposure.
